backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling customer form submissions, visitor tracking, admin‑restricted queries, and blob storage with access control integration.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites, configuration, and steps for deploying to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions including light and dark color schemes for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the favicon, hero image, metadata, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup with router configuration, error boundary, theme provider, and profile‑setup gating.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when a user lacks admin access, with error display, home navigation, and logout options.
frontend/src/components/CustomerForm.tsx: Customer inquiry form with validation, insurance selection, document upload handling, and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/DashboardFilters: Provides search, filter, and sort controls for the dashboard with inputs and select menus.
Renders the admin dashboard header with branding, user profile info, and logout button.
frontend/src/components/DashboardStats.t: Calculates and displays submission statistics including totals, today’s count, recent activity, and popular insurance types.
frontend/src/components/DashboardTable.t: Displays customer submissions in a table with details, insurance interests, and document view/download actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows the site footer with branding, links, services, and contact information.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main site header with branding, navigation links, and an admin login button.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with banner image, headline, and four statistic cards using icons and animations.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Dialog form for administrators to enter name and email, validate input, submit profile, and show success state.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Displays a grid of insurance service cards with icons, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/components/SupportSection.t: Support section highlighting 24/7 assistance with cards for phone, chat, and quick response info.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Centralized branding constants including logo paths, company details, and contact info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profile retrieval and saving, admin checks, and related optimistic updates and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for brand colors and dark mode styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Implements the admin login flow using Internet Identity, handles retries, errors, and redirects based on admin status.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays admin dashboard with form listing, filtering, sorting, and retries, and restricts access based on admin status.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the public home page with header, hero, services, support, and customer form sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, container settings, plugins, and brand color definitions using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, and descriptions of the ICP dApp’s frontend, admin dashboard, and backend capabilities.
